title: GD we played ourselves, we all got stockholm syndrome now
body:
[](http://www.discobelle.net/wp-content/uploads/2008/04/stockholm-syndrome-logo.jpg)
Think about it for a second.

This is the definition to stockholm syndrome -

> **Stockholm syndrome**
> _noun_
> The psychological tendency of a hostage to bond with, identify with, or sympathize with his or her captor.

"Wtf 2nd, your not making any sense-"

Hold it.

We got no more third party mods here now, so what's left?

_The GD Wardens._

People we've bonded and identified with (for the most part and with most of us).

"b-but 2nd we're not confined-"

_and what did Curator say in that GD Warden announcement thread again?..._

> [{quoted}](name=Mod Curator,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=XjRRwELK,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-05-22T22:35:43.397+0000)
>
> GD officially a prison now.  GG
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

"GD officially a prison now."

_We're the prisoners... the confined... and they?..._

They're the the Wardens, they're now solely ruling over us, in this new prison...

Our captors.

GD... We played ourselves into this, and this is the result.

"... 2nd your crazy."

http://esq.h-cdn.co/assets/16/44/1478267802-screen-shot-2016-11-04-at-95622-am.png

Am I?...

_Am I though?..._

######Okay maybe a little.
